Monster Rancher 2 Sales! (and an MRA2)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: The Monster Rancher Street Team -Join Us!: Miscellaneous Q&A: Monster Rancher 2 Sales! (and an MRA2)
By Kurasu Soratobu on Saturday, August 5, 2006 - 05:56 pm:

I just realized that I should have saved the letters that I got to paste the notes in! But after posting up my Monster Rancher 2 FAQ in GameFAQs, I got no less than three people who mailed back with 'I saw your FAQ, and I just knew I had to try the game...' and one friend of mine, after he read the combining FAQ, that told me fairly recently, 'I picked up a new copy of Monster Rancher!' [he's Australian]. Said Aussie friend also picked up a copy of MRA2 from the States (he has an imported Gameboy Advance) so he could play a Monster Rancher game while he hunted down his MR copy.

So while the writing was mine in actually posting the thing, this is a big, fat CONGRATULATIONS to the entirety of Monster Rancher Metropolis for getting together the information that allowed me to post that, which allowed me to get people interested in the game.

Four more down! The rest of the world to go!
